scripts.test: npm run test-unit && npm run test-integration
scripts.test-watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DEBUG=true mocha --watch --require babel-polyfill --compilers js:babel-core/register --recursive ./src/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test-integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DEBUG=true mocha --require babel-polyfill --compilers js:babel-core/register --recursive ./integration-tests/src/**/*.spec.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d lib
